creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Due to recent reorganization in the JPackage Ant RPM layout, the lib dir no
longer needs (or should) be a special case.  I'll attach a patch, see the
archive link below for more info.

Oh, and copyright years in src/bin/{antRun,antRun.bat,runant.pl} should be
updated :)

http://lists.zarb.org/pipermail/jpackage-discuss/2003-March/000666.html

creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 5277
RPM and copyright tweaks for ant scripts
Hi Henri, could you have a look at this one soon...? :)
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
conor@apache.org
text:
Could you re-examine with Ant 1.6 as lib dirs now can be processed with the -lib
option. I'm not sure what the jPackage setup doe sin this case.

creator: nicolas.mailhot@laposte.net
text:
Hopefully Ville or someone else will have the time to take a peek at ant 1.6 soon.

Note however the latest jpackage ant patch is a lot heavier than the one posted
here. The new jpp 1.5 infrastructure was just too nice not to use it for ant.
(plus there were confit file priority problems upstream)

creator: nicolas.mailhot@laposte.net
text:
Created attachment 8432
Ant patch that's been used since jpackage 1.5 stabilized some months ago
The ant script is now up-to-date with jpackage mods.
creator: peterreilly@apache.org

text: we no longer provide RPMs, so it is time to close the component as it only causes confusion.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
